verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [V: announced] [ARG1: restrictions on more than $ 50 billion worth of Chinese exports] , [ARGM-ADV: escalating a trade fight between the US and China] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] on Thursday announced restrictions on more than $ 50 billion worth of Chinese exports , [V: escalating] [ARG1: a trade fight between the US and China] .
